title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - May 21 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - May 21 2022
description:
Deep State suspends Soviet Mary Poppins and her Ministry of Truth. Buck says, "It turns out when people find out what the anti-speech Democrat apparatus is up to behind closed doors, it's a problem for them." The Biden Regime is tanking and taking Democrats with them. USC professor wants to designate the Republican Party as a terrorist group. Biden’s morally bankrupt Buffalo distraction won’t work. Blame the Buffalo shooter's parents, Clay says, not Fox News. After giving lots of examples of what was missed -- and how he and his wife are on top of internet use with their three sons -- Clay comments, "So many of these shootings are directly related to parents looking the other way."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
